transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji Rahul sir Dev baat kar raha IndiaMART se. To mam ne bola tha video meeting ke liye sir to abhi free hai online aa jayenge sir. Kuch cheezein ki wajah se lekin on kar dete hain aur baki sare to thik hain catalog quality isko 72% hai.
Executive: Main share kar doon sir abhi?
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Video meeting ka link share kar doon mail par?
Customer: Laptop laptop nahi hai abhi.
Executive: To matlab lunch ke baad ho payega 3 baje ke aas pass?
Customer: Haan bilkul ho jayega. Ek bar call kar lijiyega.
Executive: Thik hai sir thik hai bilkul.
Customer: Ek bar dekhiyega calls nahi aa rahe hain mere pass.
Executive: Haan calls to aa rahi hain inquiry bhi aa rahi hain. Haan wohi cheez sir usi pe kuch dekh rahe hain notification vagera kuch close hai.
Customer: Baat karna ek kya bolte hain 50,000 ka matter tha.
Executive: Haan ye 55,000 wala sir ek banda koi hai complaint kiya hua hai All Agro Industry karke hai. Haan to ispe apna New Vanshika ke naam se firm hai usi ki hai. Isne isi ke number se mere se deal kari hai. Isne bola pehle ka main pura payment kar dunga aur kya bolte hain aapko naya bhi payment kar dunga par isne 50,000 hi bheje. To maine iski gaadi cancel kar di. Maine bola pehle ka payment aap pura bhejiye. Aur uske related maine mail bhi kar diya tha mere ko jo aap legal team se ya kisi se call aaya tha.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ki unhone bola aap whatsapp ke chat bhej dijiye agar kya bolte hain aisa hi hai to teen number se aapki baat hui thi to. Maine pura unko screenshot bhej diya tha aap unse concern kariyega ki kya hua is matter ka matter ko jaldi se jaldi hataya jaye.
Executive: Haan iska to open hai. Baki ek haan thik hai unka aaya hua hai 55,000 ka hai 55000 ka.
Customer: 50,000 ka hi tha.
Executive: Hmm thik hai koi dikkat nahi hai sir jo bhi hai aap jo bhi hai.
Customer: 50,000 ki slip bheji hai usne New Vanshika wale ne. Aur usne uske khilaf pehle bhi complaint karke uska account block karwa rakha hai teen char janon ne karwa rakha hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To ye banda jo complaint kiya hai sir to inka matlab kya aapke abhi matlab product ho gaya hai sara kuch bas kya dikkat aa rahi hai matlab.
Customer: Nahi nahi sir iska kya hai pehle ke apne kafi pehle se deal chal rahi thi iski.
Executive: Thik hai main purana customer hai aapka ye.
Customer: Pichle pichle pichle saal isne apne 1,26,000 rakh ke aur na kya bolte hain phone band kar diya tha.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ye baat nahi karta tha fir maine complaint karke iska account bhi band karwa diya tha. Mere ke pass bhi ja ke aaya tha factory pe mila bhi nahi tha bahar se hi bhaga diya tha matlab andar hi nahi aane diya tha. To aise karke do char janon ne iske khilaf complaint kar rakhi hai fraud aadmi hai ye.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Fir isko dobara se maal chahiye tha.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Dobara se maal chahiye tha to humne bola ki pehle ka payment kar tu. Ab isne jo pehle ka payment kiya na wo ye dusri company ke naam se kar diya MI kuch karke hai na jo bhi ML haan ML Agro Industry Private Limited naam se kiya hua hai. Hai usi ki ye New Vanshika wale ki. Haan same number se hi deal ho rahi hai apni jisse pehle deal ho rahi thi na mere pass pura record hai whatsapp pe.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Jisse starting se pehle deal hui thi haan iski actual company New Vanshika hai sir.
Executive: Haan isne ab wo naam se to block kar diya apan ne company. Haan New Vanshika apan ne kya teen char janon ne complaint kari thi iske khilaf kafi paisa leke bhaga hai ye.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To fir isne naye naam se kar diya kyunki New Vanshika ke naam se to apan ne block kar rakha hai iska.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To isne naye naam se kiya hai na to usi naam ke account se usne 50,000 bheje jo pehle ke bhejne the na isko. To maine bola pura payment nahi bhejoge jab tak main gaadi aapki nahi nikalunga. Gaadi nahi niklegi. Pehle ka 125 aa raha hai 50 bheja fir bhi 75,000 reh gaye.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To pehle ka hi iska payment aa raha hai ulti aapko iska account aur band karna chahiye.
Executive: Haan to ye wali to bani hai sir matlab ye high risk suspected mein aa raha hai matlab inhone pehle bhi fraud kiye hue hain IndiaMART se. Complaint aaya hua hai is naam se kyunki ML Agro already ye matlab high risk suspected mein aa raha hai. Pata hai is wale ispe bhi aaya hua hai.
Executive: Haan ispe bhi aaya hua hai pehle bhi high risk suspected matlab inhone pehle bhi fraud kiya hua hai. Aur ye download hai already profile ka vagera matlab.
Executive: Ye download hai profile inki already.
Customer: Legal team se baat karwa ke mere usko hatwaiye isko ye abhi to 75,000 aur dene hain inko kaisa advance.
Executive: 75,000 dene hain jab wo pura payment ho jayega tab gaadi niklegi right. Wo 75,000 to pehle ke aur fir new payment karega uske baad hi to gaadi niklegi.
Customer: Haan uske baad niklegi samajh gaye. Apun ko to ek saal se apan iske khilaf lad rahe hain. Ye nayi company bana ke aa jayega to kya bolte hain same baat to same usse hi ho rahi hai isne mere se bola ki main pura aap gaadi lagaiye aapka pehle ka bhi kar dunga aur naya bhi kar dunga. Jab ja ke maine isse deal ke liye haa kari thi aur ye fir 50,000 ye kya aise hi fasata hai ye. Ye gaadi lag jati hai na to kya bolte hain fir hai na kehta hai ki payment mein dal raha hun dal raha hun dal raha hun late karta karta aakhri mein thoda amount dalta fir gaadi nikalni padti apan ko. Fir maine gaadi to puri utarwai wapas se mera kharcha aa gaya bahut zyada. Aur maine bola koi baat nahi gaadi ko wapas bulaya maine bola koi baat nahi tu aaja gaadi wale ko paise diye par main bhej nahi sakta kyunki ek bar dhoka kha gaye jisse dobara kaise dhoka khaenge.
Executive: Thik hai sir ye wala main legal team ko bol deta hun aise ye to waise bhi legal team se baat kariye jisse high risk suspected hai uski kya wo kar dijiye aap.
Executive: Baki thik hai ek to aapke kyunki profile pe do ticket hai na to ek wala to wo 55,000 wala rehne dete hain ek to ek aur hai open hai matlab missing incoming ka hua hai. To aapne kal parso mein call kiya tha call kiya tha call nahi answer hui thi hum logon ke pass Pelya madam ke pass ya mere pass aapne kal parso mein call kiya tha.
Customer: Haan ek ek call aap Dev bol rahe hain na.
Executive: Haan haan Dev baat kar raha hun sir.
Customer: To kya bolte hain wo isliye kehta hai yaar wo calls nahi aa rahi hai aur inquiry jo aa rahi hai na mere pass inquiry bhi matlab wo kya kehte hain by lead by lead aa rahi hai.
Executive: Small quantity mein aa rahi hai.
Customer: Small quantity mein aa rahi hai.
Executive: Small quantity mein bilkul.
Customer: Big quantity nahi aa rahi pehle ki tarah.
Executive: Haan wo improve kar lenge sir uska to wo to sab hamare hath mein hai sari cheezein wo kar lenge hum log milke improve aur to apne pass do hai do ticket open hai ek to jo incoming wali hai sir wo main close kar de raha hun ticket baki wo wala abhi legal team se discuss karke fir usko close karenge thik hai sir.
Customer: Haan baat kariye legal team se maine bhej diya tha mail bhi unko unhone bola tha jo wo bhi kuch chahiye unko wo bhi apan support karenge pura koi dikkat nahi hai apan fraud hai. Haan bas coordinate aap call answer kar lijiyega jo bhi hai sab bata dijiyega sari cheezein sir thik hai. Ek bar aap hi baat kariye unse. Bilkul bilkul hum baat karenge bataya hamari profile pe impact pad raha hai.
Executive: Haan ye to padega hi bilkul sir kyunki effect padta hai ye. Thik hai aap sir ek bar ye wala jo incoming ka hai na ek feedback aayega us pe yes kar dijiyega sir thik hai please.
Customer: Okay koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Thik hai Rahul sir thank you.
Customer: Haan ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving calls.

- Customer facing issues with a fraudulent buyer.

- Wants legal team to remove fraudulent profile.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve call issue.

- Executive assured to connect with legal team.

- Executive will close the incoming ticket.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, verification, fraud, buyleads
